summary:
I have been searching for something that would give me a quick view of ALL of my containers in a simple dashboard and give me the ability to do a few things like search for specific containers quickly, see IP addresses, volume mounts, networks, uptime, etc.  I didn’t really find anything that suited my purposes.  …
The post Docker Dashboard: New Tool Let’s You See Containers Across Multiple Hosts appeared first on Virtualization Howto...
title: Docker Dashboard: New Tool Let’s You See Containers Across Multiple Hosts

summary:
A couple of weeks ago, Jay reached out to see if I’d be like to be a guest on Conduit and of course I immediately said yes. 
We spoke about some of my projects including what I’m doing with EchoFeed and then I was challenged[1] to make a site, which I did.  In the super conductors post-show Jay asked me about British cars and I had to channel all of my knowledge from Top Gear and Grand Tour...
title: I Was a Guest on Conduit
